input.sentences: we attended a new year 's party at [male] and [female] 's home .
we took a selfie to capture the evening and remember the fun we had .
[male] reluctantly agreed to wear a happy new year 's hat ; however | [female] loved acting goofy and wearing the hat and sunglasses .
i had to snap a quick picture of [female] | as she was trying to avoid my camera all evening .
we partied until almost 2 am | and the hosts ensured that all the couples got their new year 's photo taken before going home .
output.sentences: Katie and Bug always loved to celebrate New Years with their friends.
Although Katie loves to take pictures, Bug thinks every snapshot steals parts of his soul and demands to take her selfie to ensure he's out of the shot.
Katie thought Bug's boundaries were strange and tries not to include him so much in pictures: here's one of her and Ted having an excellent time.
Katie took a picture of Sandie and Becky with the pink hair, trying to understand Bug's trigger of hating his picture taken.
Bug's breakthrough is halted when the hosts turn on the ambient red nap lights. Everyone else enjoyed New Years.
